availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Livingston County, Kentucky, clerk. Native of France. Married to Zelia Renaud Larrett in Livingston County, Kentucky, on October 14, 1858. Father of Ida Larrett. Resident of Livingston County in 1858. Clerk in Livingston County in June 1863.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Mortality Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Smithland, p. 932.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994045, Livingston County Marriages, p. 217.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Livingston County, KY, June 1863, p. 12.
Texas Department of State Health Services. Texas Death Certificates (1903â€“1982), Dallas County Deaths, File #45890.
